cast.overview: A retelling of the biblical book of Hosea set against the backdrop of the California Gold Rush of 1850.
cast.title: Redeeming Love

details.biography: Martial Batchamen Tchana is a Cape-Town-based actor. Originally Born in Cameroon he arrived in South Africa at the age of 8 years. Martial was introduced into the film and television industry shortly after his arrival in South Africa. His first appearance in an international series was in Charlie Jade. After a few years, he took a break to complete his studies and returned into the entertainment industry as a voice actor in 2017 and into the film scene in 2018. Martial has since then appeared in both local and international screens.
details.name: Martial Batchamen Tchana
